div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1824 Kitab, c. 80 km. S of Samarkand, (567) Uzbekistan (anc. Sogdiana), 1906 Burial: 200-150 B.C. (M) Contents: 100+ AR Demetrius I, Bactria: dr.; ob. Antimachus I: 1 dr.; 1 ob. Eucratides: tetradr.; dr.; ob. Disposition: Berlin 1 (Eucratides tetradr. with Heliocles and Laodice rev.) â€ Masson, Izv. Sredazkomstaris 3 (Tashkent, 1928), p. 284 Vasmer, p. 282, no. 1
